### Screen QC
<br>

#### Sample Sheet

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(reactable)
df <- as.data.frame(read.table("/Users/fs18/Desktop/Sang/HGI/codesRep/sgeQC/test/screen/sample_sheet.tsv", header = TRUE, sep = "\t", check.names = FALSE))
reactable(df, highlight = TRUE, bordered = TRUE,  striped = TRUE, compact = TRUE, wrap = FALSE,
          theme = reactableTheme(style = list(fontFamily = "-apple-system", fontSize = "0.75rem")))
```
<br>
